statements.statement: CREATE TABLE #Eids(Eid varchar(50),Ref nvarchar(max),Terms nvarchar(300),[Level] int);
SELECT Eid,Reference,'--',0 FROM Eid_Ref WHERE CONTAINS(Reference,'{0}'); IF @@ROWCOUNT > 0 GOTO GetData;
SELECT Eid,Reference,'{0}',{1} FROM Eid_Ref WHERE Eid NOT IN (SELECT Eid FROM #Eids) AND CONTAINS(Reference,'{2}'); IF @@ROWCOUNT > 0 GOTO GetData;
GetData: DECLARE @lvl INT SET @lvl = (SELECT MIN([Level]) FROM #Eids); IF @lvl < 2 SELECT * FROM #Eids WHERE [Level] = @lvl ELSE SELECT TOP 1 * FROM #Eids WHERE [Level] = @lvl;
